org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow

Class WorkflowConcretiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow.WorkflowConcretiser

  • public class WorkflowConcretiser
extends java.lang.Object
    Tries to make an abstract workflow concrete by replacing all abstract atomic activities with concrete ones from a activity repository.
    Author:
    clc

      • concretise

        public java.util.Collection<Pair<Activity,Activity>> concretise(Workflow workflow)
        Concretise all abstract atomic activities of the workflow
        Returns:
        A collection of all replaced activities and their replacements

      • concretise

        private Pair<Activity,Activity> concretise(Workflow workflow,
                                           AtomicActivity act)
        Replace the given abstract activity with a concrete one from the repository
        Parameters:
        workflow - Parent workflow of activity that is to be replaced
        act - To be replaced
        Returns:
        Replaced activities and its replacement or null if not replaced

      • getActivitiesFromRepository

        private java.util.Collection<Activity> getActivitiesFromRepository()
        Collects all root activities from the given workflow repository
